citeinfo.title: Monteverde Cloud Forest Preserve Wasp data

descript.abstract: Sean O'Donnell collected data for a list of eusocial wasps from the Monteverde Cloud Forest Preserve, with elevational ranges at which colonies have been observed or collected. Monteverde, Costa Rica has captured world-wide attention of biologists, conservationists, and the nature-oriented public. The diverse habitats, organisms, and interactions in primary and human-affected landscapes of the Monteverde area have been investigated for over 30 years. The Monteverde Cloud Forest Reserve, a private preserve administered by the Tropical Science Foundation, protects 12,000 hectares of primary montane cloud forest, fosters research projects, and provides environmental education for over 40,000 Costa Ricans and international visitors each year. Over 125 ecologists, agriculturists, and educators have contributed to the interest in natural history and ecology of the area by compiling and synthesizing the existing pool of information and in so doing, to motivate further research in ecology and conservation. Our major objectives are to bring together the extensive body of knowledge that researchers and natural historians have gathered; to point up connections among the various research projects that have taken place; to identify areas for future research areas; and to highlight research that bears on conservation of the area.
descript.purpose: The purpose of this data is to provide data for a list of eusocial wasps from Monteverde.
descript.supplinf: Information was obtained from http://192.211.16.13/individuals/nadkarnn/monteverde/MVHome.html. (previous geoform was 'list')

spdom.descgeog: Monteverde Cloud Forest Preserve, Monteverde, Costa Rica

cntperp.cntorg: University of Washington, Department of Psychology

dataqual.complete: A list of eusocial wasps, not necessarily all of the wasp varieties that exist in Monteverde Cloud Forest Preserve.

overview.eaover: Entity - wasp; Attributes - list and elevational range

distinfo.distliab: Although these data have been processed successfully on a computer system at the Monteverde Cloud Forest Preserve, no warranty expressed or implied is made regarding the accuracy or utility of the data on any other system or for general or scientific purposes, nor shall the act of distribution constitute any such warranty. This disclaimer applies both to individual use of the data and aggregate use with other data. It is strongly recommended that these data are directly acquired from a Monteverde Cloud Forest Preserve server, and not indirectly through other sources which may have changed the data in some way. It is also strongly recommended that careful attention be paid to the contents of the metadata file associated with these data. The Monteverde Cloud Forest Preserve shall not be held liable for improper or incorrect use of the data described and/or contained herein.
